structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Carrying Away Or Conversion Of Certain Milk Containers Without Permission Of Owners
law.text: Whoever, without permission of the owner, carries away or converts to his own use a plastic or wire milk case or a plastic or wire container for milk products which has been indelibly stamped with the name of a milk dealer or association of milk dealers shall be punished by a fine of not less than ten and not more than one hundred dollars.
